sentences.sContent: As for you, go back home.
Once you have some lists you can go back to your tasks by choosing the Tasks option.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once you have some lists you can go back to your tasks by choosing the Tasks option.
sentences.sCn: 一旦你有了这些列表，你就能通过选择任务选项返回到你的任务。

sentences.sContent: You know, new clothes are best, and so are old acquaintances. I think, you'd better go back.
sentences.sContent_eng: You know, new clothes are best, and so are old acquaintances. I think, you'd better go back.
sentences.sCn: 衣不如新， 人不如旧， 依我看来， 你还是回去好些。
